formSubmissionSessionId.description: The randomly generated ID that identifies the form submission session. It can be used to connect submissions of different steps of the same form.

stepId.description: The ID of the step being submitted, if the form has steps.

finalStep.description: Whether this is the final step of a multi-step form, or true if the form does not have steps.

submitterIpAddress.description: The IP address from which the submission was made.

pageUrl.description: The full URL of the page where the form is being shown.
